page.title: 19Transport in Cottesmore
page.content: Blands garage is in Cottesmore village opposite Stricklands.Blands buses go to Oakham,Billsdon,Halstead, Braunston,Burley,Exton & Cottesmore. We go to swimming on the Blands buses, & we go on school trips with them. Blands buses are owned by Mrs Bland. It costs 52p to go to Oakham, for an adult, 32p for a child.There is a free bus to Finefair in Grantham. Finefair is a super- store, it has a big cafe. The Blands bus station is in Cottesmore village, next to Blands cottage were Mrs Bland lives.There are taxis in Oakham. If you want a taxi you have to phone from outside the N.A.A.F.I. then ask for Silverline taxi service and tell them what time you want them to come, where you live & your address.
